itunes:summary:
New York Times best-selling author Steven Kotler joins the show to discuss his new novel "The Devil's Dictionary", the time a hospital accidentally OD'd him on ketamine, his favorite Scottish curse words, and why constraints and outlining are so important to effective storytelling.
